body:
Hi Bernd,


It was my understanding that the proposal was to modify the users $PATH varrible to include the /usr/radiance/compat/whatever  path.  This means Greg doesn't have to re-write all of his code and makes it possible that a rview/genbox namespace conflict may arise.


-Chas
